arts.ttl: Napoli chief: We won't overpay for Garnacho
arts.sum: Napoli's sporting director Giovanni Manna spoke about the prospect of signing Manchester United winger Alejandro Garnacho ahead of his team's win over Juventus on Saturday, emphasising that the Serie A leaders won't over-extend themselves financially.
